text: The Invisible Man is a 1929-1932 surrealist oil on canvas by Salvador Dalí, now in the Museo Reina Sofía in Madrid. It is an experimental work, drawing on ancient Egyptian art and the work of Giuseppe Arcimboldo.http://www.salvador- dali.org/cataleg_raonat/resized_imatge.php?obra=237&imatge;=1 ==References== category:1932 paintings category:Paintings by Salvador Dalí category:Paintings of the Museo Nacional Centro de Arte Reina Sofía
title: The Invisible Man (painting)
